subject: Triathlon
Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Ironman Triathlon (Hawaii)
lead_paragraph: While cycling was at the center of the details released by the United States Anti-Doping Agency regarding its investigation of Lance Armstrong, his relatively new triathlon career also drew interest.
snippet: While cycling was at the center of the details released by the United States Anti-Doping Agency regarding its investigation of Lance Armstrong, his relatively new triathlon career also drew interest.
